attributes.action: Allow EMA to be given to all teenagers aged 16-19.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think it is unfair that only specific teenagers are being given up to £30 a week. Just because certain families don't fall into the working class catagory, doesn't mean their children don't need it also.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
